## Protocol

-   Note
    -   date
    -   time
    -   plot
    -   tree id
-   tree Dawkins index
-   Sample a branch with the Big Short from the canopy, trop crown area and in the light if possible
-   Select 10-20 leaves
-   Place the leaves in a ziplock filled with CO2 at the mouth with a tissue moistened with a mister
-   Label with the tree code
-   Store samples in a double black bin bag

## Preparation

-   Charge the camera
-   Prepare ziplocks with label and tissues

## Material

-   Camera
-   Binoculars
-   Big Shot with weights and wire
-   Helmets
-   Micrometer
-   AA batteries
-   SPAD
-   Flat batteries
-   Scissors
-   Ziplocks
-   Labels
-   Tissues
-   Bin bags
-   Plastic box
-   Pencil Markers
-   Protocols
-   Maps
-   Field notebook
